06/22/98 06:24:16
Name: Manuel Acevedo My Email: Email Me
Make: Chevrolet Model: C/10
Year: 1967

Comments:
I think this page is great. My 67 is under a slow resto but I love her. I plan to send a picture sometime soon. I pulled the original 283 and put in an 86 350 four bolt block bored .030 over with high compression TRW pistons. It has a corvette cam from an L82 and bigger heads than stock 350 heads. It has an Edelbrock performer manifold with a 650 CFM carb, a high volume oil pump and HEI to replace the points. It still has the original 3-speed on the column and a 3.73 geared rearend. I just bought this P and this is one of the first sites I visited and it kicks major butt. later.
